title: Got 2 ORDER OF LOTUS skin sets from 2 birdie bags
body:
Just got 2 ORDER OF LOTUS skin sets from 2 birdie bags. How come, riot?
"Skin lines have an equal chance of dropping."
Can you do basic math? The probability that I get 2 ORDER OF LOTUS skin sets from 2 birdie bags is 1/79*79= 1/6241(There are 79 skin lines).

GIVE ME AN EXPLANATION, RIOT.

replies.body: For those who don't know what is an ORDER OF LOTUS skin set: It's the worst skin line, contains 2 skins, a 750 rp skin and 975 rp skin.

Well you did the math yourself. It's unlikely, but not impossible to draw what you did. It's unfortunate that you aren't happy with the skins, personally they're not my favourite but I don't dislike them. Regrettably that is the nature of randomised content, you are guaranteed to get something, but not necessarily something you want.
